article_title: Federal Prosecutors in Milwaukee Charge Man With Plotting Mass Shooting
article_text:
Federal authorities in Milwaukee charged a man Tuesday with allegedly plotting to kill some 30 people with automatic weapons in hopes of inspiring radical Islamists to committing similar crimes.

Prosecutors charged Samy Mohamed Hamzeh, 23 years old, with possessing machine guns and a silencer after arresting him Monday in Milwaukee, following a roughly five-month investigation into Mr. Hamzeh’s abortive plans to attack Israeli...
